price: 41 Que Nous te fassions disparaître avant de tirer vengeance d’eux
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
